SELECT c.`id` AS card_id, c.`card_product_id` AS card_product_id, cp.`card_product_name` AS card_name,
t.`id` AS id, t.`store_name` AS store_name, t.`amount` AS amount, t.`date` AS date FROM `card` c JOIN `card_product` cp ON cp.`id` = c.`card_product_id` LEFT JOIN `transaction` t ON t.`card_id` = c.`id` WHERE c.`member_id` = #{memberId} ORDER BY c.`id` ASC, t.`date` DESC
